availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel Rogers Tolle (Barren County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff)

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret C. Tolle. Father of John T. Tolle. Married to Rachel A. E. Childress Tolle in Barren County, Kentucky on August 20, 1862. Father of Lelia S. Tolle and Sally B. Tolle. Farmer in Barren County in 1850. Resident in Barren County in 1860. Sheriff in Barren County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Division 1, p. 370B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, District 2, p. 930.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Glasgow, p. 557A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Barren County Marriages, Film #000216816, p. 26.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Barren County, KY, February 1864, p. 154 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Samuel Rogers Tolle (1825-1900)," Memorial #72436857, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/72436857 (accessed August 20, 2019).
